channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiMail
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiMail

item.title: CVE-2022-26114|2024-08-03T04:56:37.458Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortimail
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in the Webmail of FortiMail before 7.2.0 may allow an unauthenticated attacker to trigger a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack via sending specially crafted mail messages.
